articles.title: Eyekandy Launches Sales Ambassador, World's First Digital Human Super-Salesperson for Every Point of Purchase
articles.summary: Eyekandy has launched Sales Ambassador, a new AI-powered digital human designed to transform the shopping experience. This product provides real-time product guidance across various channels like online, in-store, and social media, aiming to drive sales and reduce servicing costs for retailers. Sales Ambassador offers personalized recommendations and integrates with existing retail infrastructure.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Review: Fantastic, but Flawed
articles.author: Dean Blake
articles.summary: The Switch 2 features a 7.9'' 1080p 120hz LCD display. The console exhibits improved performance, running Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom at a locked 60fps in both handheld and docked mode after an upgrade pack was installed. The Switch 2 console also can run Cyberpunk 2077 at 30-40fps.

articles.title: Nopa Fish Debuts at Ferry Building, With Fish & Chips, Tuna Melts and More
articles.summary: Laurence Jossel, owner of Nopa, has launched Nopa Fish, a new fish market and counter-service restaurant at the Ferry Building in partnership with Joe Conte. Nopa Fish offers fresh, local seafood and a menu of seafood snacks and sandwiches, including chowder, arancini, and various sandwiches like the fried rockfish sandwich and smoked albacore tuna melt. The restaurant is in soft-opening mode and will have its official opening on June 17.

articles.title: Popular pizza chain adds experimental new menu item fans will love
articles.author: Fernanda Tronco
articles.summary: Papa Johns is introducing the new Croissant Pizza, which combines its iconic pizza sauce and toppings with a new buttery and flaky braided croissant crust. Currently available in the United Arab Emirates, Papa Johns is bringing it for a limited time across participating markets, including Korea, China, Chile, and Peru. Papa Johns has recently updated its menu to win back customers amid a challenging environment by introducing the Cheddar Crust Pizza in Canada and relaunched the Shaq-a-Roni Pizza.

articles.title: BluSky AI Inc. Announces Completion of Modular Design  Jun. 11, 2025 22:11
articles.summary: BluSky AI Inc. has launched its SkyMod series, a modular AI datacenter infrastructure designed for both indoor and outdoor deployment. The series includes SkyMod One (1 MW) and SkyMod XL (1.7 MW) and integrates NVIDIA GPUs. The company positions SkyMod as a solution for AI companies to focus on product development by providing scalable, efficient, and rapidly deployable compute.

articles.title: Chromafora Receives Frost & Sullivan's 2025 Global New Product Innovation Award for Excellence in PFAS Water Treatment Solutions  Jun. 11, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: Chromafora received the 2025 Global New Product Innovation Award for its SELPAXT™ technology. SELPAXT™ is a PFAS remediation solution integrating Surfactant-ligand Assisted Membrane Filtration (SAMF) chemistry, ultrafiltration membranes, automatic regeneration, and remote monitoring. It offers continuous performance in high-concentration PFAS environments.

articles.title: 25 Target Dresses To Make Outfit Planning Easy
articles.author: Ellie Jane Rudy
articles.summary: The company has launched a new line of dresses. The dresses are available in various styles, colors, and sizes, with prices ranging from $15 to $55. The company provides a variety of styles like mini, midi, maxi dress and also provide the sizes XS to 4X.

articles.title: Landers Superstore goes all-out for its 9th year with its biggest Super Crazy Sale yet
articles.author: Inquirer.Net Brandroom
articles.summary: Landers Superstore is celebrating its 9th anniversary with the 'Super Crazy Sale' from June 11-15, 2025, featuring 50% off and Buy 1 Get 1 deals, along with Piso Sales on select items. Landers Central and Doppio are offering discounted food items, including pizzas, burgers, hotdogs, pasta, and coffee. New Landers members and renewals can avail 50% discount till June 30th.

articles.title: Samsung teases smarter 'Ultra' AI camera for the Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Brady Snyder
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, which will feature upgraded camera technology. The new foldable phone will incorporate an intelligent camera system powered by AI, allowing it to understand scenes and adapt settings automatically. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to feature the 200MP camera sensor from the Galaxy Z Fold 6 Special Edition.

articles.title: McDonald's adds S'mores McFlurry to menu
articles.summary: McDonald's has launched a new McFlurry for a limited time.

articles.title: Walmart drone delivery service is coming to five new cities
articles.author: Erin Keller
articles.summary: Walmart is expanding its drone delivery service to five new US cities, including Arkansas, Florida, Georgia, North Carolina, and Texas. The service will launch at 100 stores, with drones capable of traveling up to six miles, delivering items weighing 2.4 to 10 pounds within 30 minutes. Drone delivery is available for Walmart+ members for free for a limited time and $19.99 for non-members.

articles.title: Walmart drone delivery service is coming to five new cities
articles.author: Erin Keller
articles.summary: Walmart is expanding its drone delivery service to five more US cities, including Arkansas, Florida, Georgia, North Carolina, and Texas. This service, using Wing-branded drones, delivers select items weighing 2.4 to 10 pounds within 30 minutes. Drone delivery is free for Walmart+ members for a limited time and $19.99 per delivery for non-members.

articles.title: Nexstar Media Group Releases New Investor Presentation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nexstar Media Group's local content division released enhanced local content offerings, including Nexstar's Very Local App featuring news, weather, and content. Nexstar's local content also provides optional hyperlocal content offerings for all Nexstar's linear distribution.

articles.title: How to Build a Stunning Landing Page in Nigeria: Top Tools for Beginners
articles.author: Daniel Aiyegbusi
articles.summary: Instapage is a landing page builder which provides conversion optimisation features and professional-grade analytics with conversion-focused templates, A/B testing and visitor behavior analytics. Leadpages provides high-converting landing page templates, built-in lead capture forms with email marketing integration, A/B testing capabilities, Pop-up and alert bar tools and Facebook and Instagram advertising integration.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch: Record-Breaking 3.5M Units Sold
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch, selling 3.5 million units during its initial launch window. The console's hybrid design, which allows both handheld and home console gameplay, and the availability of games like The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, were key factors driving sales and adoption. The success of the Nintendo Switch launch is a critical moment in the gaming market.

articles.title: Android 16 update rolled out for Google Pixel devices: Check latest features, compatible phones
articles.author: Dhruv Mohan
articles.summary: Google has launched Android 16, featuring upgrades in accessibility, security, and productivity, with a refreshed look using Material 3 Expressive design. New features include Live Updates, Advanced Protection, and Adaptive Apps Across Devices, enhancing cross-device compatibility. The update is currently available for Pixel 6 and newer devices.

articles.title: Hot dads deserve great fans at 43% off (under $30!) for Father's Day
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: A hands-free portable neck fan is presented as an ideal Father's Day gift, touted for use in ball games or mowing lawns. Over 8,000 units were sold on Amazon in the previous month and has multiple colors, featuring 360-degree airflow, up to 18 hours of runtime, and 3-speed settings.

articles.title: Mum sparks debate after revealing why she NEVER washes new clothes, bedding or charity buys – but whose side are you on?
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: smol, a sustainable cleaning expert, provides laundry tips, recommending washing most loads at 20°C for 30 minutes using their detergent, which is gentler on fabrics and slashes energy use. They also explain the difference between bio and non-bio detergents, with bio detergents containing enzymes that are effective at breaking down tough stains at mid to low temperatures.

articles.title: Salesforce Launches Marketing Cloud Next
articles.summary: Salesforce has launched Marketing Cloud Next, a new marketing solution powered by autonomous AI agents. Marketing Cloud Next uses Agentforce to build and deploy campaigns faster, personalize customer engagement, and optimize ad performance. The AI agents work across sales, service, and commerce to orchestrate customer engagement.

articles.title: Starbucks to use AI to cut wait time and make service faster
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Starbucks is launching a new AI assistant, Green Dot Assist, at 35 stores this month to help baristas work faster and more efficiently using Microsoft Azure's OpenAI platform. The AI tool, available on a tablet behind the counter, will provide quick answers about drink recipes and equipment fixes and is expected to fully roll out across U.S. and Canadian stores in fiscal year 2026.

articles.title: Sun-Kissed, Melanin-Protected: Inside NIVEAs Smart Launch of Their UV Face Sunscreen for African Skin
articles.author: Bellanaija
articles.summary: Beiersdorf, the makers of NIVEA, launched the new Nivea UV Face Sunscreen in Lagos at Sol Beach. The launch event was themed around summer and highlighted the sunscreen's benefits for African skin.

articles.title: Taboola's clickbaity chumbox is evolving into an AI chatbot
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Taboola is launching 'DeeperDive,' an AI chatbot, in beta on USA Today and The Independent. This tool answers reader questions using information from trusted journalists and lists related articles alongside contextually relevant ads. DeeperDive allows publishers to insert high-intent ads directly into the AI-powered results page.

articles.title: How to get the perfect summer glow up with Aldi's middle aisle beauty buys including a £4.99 serum that smells amazing
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced new summer essentials, including a £4.99 Lacura serum, £3.49 Lacura lip balms, a £9.99 bergamot and vanilla candle, and a £39.99 bladeless fan. The Lacura serum, available in brightening or bronzing options, features niacinamide and hyaluronic acid. Other items include Hotel Collection Spa Essential Oils for £3.39 and Satin Pillowcases for £3.99.

articles.title: How to get the perfect summer glow up with Aldi's middle aisle beauty buys including a £4.99 serum that smells amazing
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Aldi has launched new products for the summer, including the Lacura Watermelon Bronzing Serum for £4.99 and Lacura lip balms for £3.49, Hotel Collection Premium Glass Candle (£9.99), bladeless fan for £39.99 and Satin Pillowcases for £3.99. The supermarket is expanding its beauty and home product lines for the summer season.

articles.title: How to get the perfect summer glow up with Aldi's middle aisle beauty buys including a £4.99 serum that smells amazing
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced new beauty and home products in its middle aisle. These include a £4.99 Lacura watermelon-flavored serum, £3.49 Lacura lip balms, a £9.99 bergamot and vanilla candle, £3.39 Hotel Collection Spa Essential Oils and a £39.99 bladeless fan.

articles.title: Panasonic hair dryer now 55% styles locks 'with no damage or fly aways'
articles.author: Ambarish Awale
articles.summary: Panasonic's EH-NA65 Nanoe Hair Dryer, featuring Nanoe Technology for hair moisture retention and shine, is currently on sale at Amazon for £49.99, a 55% discount. The dryer includes attachments like a diffuser and concentrator for versatile styling and quick drying.

articles.title: Adapting Social Launches Generative Engine Optimization Services and Doubles Down on AI-Powered Marketing
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Adapting Social has launched Generative Engine, a new service offering. This launch represents a major evolution in the company's service offerings, adapting to the transformative impact of generative AI on brand engagement.

articles.title: Pot Noodle launching brand-new flavour in Asda this week after demand from shoppers
articles.author: Blathnaid Corless
articles.summary: Pot Noodle is launching a new 'Flame Grilled Steak' flavor exclusively in Asda stores for £1.20 per pot. The flavor, described as a combination of classic noodles and a smokey, grilled steak flavor sauce, was highly requested by fans and is suitable for vegetarians and vegans. The product is the latest addition to a long list of Pot Noodle flavors.

articles.title: Roborock isn't broadcasting this 50% off deal —but we are
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 50% discount on the Roborock Qrevo Master Robot Vacuum and Mop combo. This robotic vacuum features 10,000 Pascal of suction, automatic mop washing and drying, self-emptying and self-refilling capabilities, FlexiArm side brush and mop, and AI obstacle avoidance.

articles.title: Still Searching for the Right Flavor? Try These RAZ Picks
articles.summary: RAZ introduces three new vape flavors: Berry Ice, Tiffany, and Miami Mint, designed for different preferences and use cases.  RAZ also launched RAZ Purse Vape a compact vape device that pairs with RAZ's flavor lineup. The new product and new flavors are designed to avoid common mistakes and enhance the vaping experience.

articles.title: HONOR 400 5G set for PHL launch on June 17
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: HONOR is launching the HONOR 400 5G smartphone in the Philippines on June 17. Marketed as an 'AI Phone,' it features an Image-to-Video capability, a 200MP AI main camera, a 6,000mAh battery with fast charging, and operates on MagicOS 9.0 based on Android 15.

articles.title: Anker releases soundcore Liberty 5 wireless earbuds in PHL
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: Anker Innovations, through its soundcore brand, has launched the Liberty 5 wireless earbuds in the Philippines, priced at P5,995. The Liberty 5 features Adaptive ANC 3.0, Dolby Audio, a 9.2mm wool-paper composite driver, and promises up to 48 hours of listening time with the charging case. This release aims to strengthen Anker's position in the wireless headphone market.

articles.title: Amazon has Stanley's new Shaker bottle in even more colors — and you can get ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Stanley has launched its new Activate Shake Bottle. The product is currently available on Amazon in multiple colors.

articles.title: Nobl's all-in-one luggage is this summer's hottest travel essential—and it's on sale ✈️
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Nobl Travel is promoting its All-in-One Carry-On Suitcase, highlighting its hands-free design and features such as a pop-out cup holder. The suitcase is currently on sale for a limited time.

articles.title: Ensueño Laundry is Bringing The Abuela Attitude Right To Your Laundry Room with the "Abuela Tag Reader" Campaign
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Ensueño Laundry has launched a new digital experience called "Abuela Tag Reader." This service aims to help users understand laundry care tags with guidance from real-life abuelas, offering best practices and techniques. Customers can access the service at AbuelaTagReader.com and can also redeem a coupon for $2 off select Ensueño products at H-E-B.

articles.title: Forget the Ninja SLUSHi, this ‘optimized' slushie machine is on sale and it's selling fast
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: INOVIVA has launched the 72 oz Frozen Drink Maker, a dupe of the Ninja SLUSHi, featuring a 'No Ice Needed' function and self-cleaning mode. The product has a 4.8 out of 5 stars rating based on Walmart customer reviews and is available at a discounted price of $240.

articles.title: PubNub Evolves Its Platform with AI-Native Development, Real-Time Moderation, and Decision Intelligence
articles.summary: PubNub unveiled the next evolution of its platform, introducing AI-native development, real-time decision intelligence, and in-network content moderation. These updates aim to enable developers to build rich, real-time experiences faster and with greater control, simplifying access to PubNub's capabilities.

articles.title: Talkdesk shatters outdated customer experience paradigm with launch of Customer Experience Automation platform
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Talkdesk launched Customer Experience Automation (CXA), disrupting the customer experience (CX) market. This new product signifies Talkdesk's entry into the customer experience automation space.

articles.title: Google Treats the Pixel Fold Like a Phone, Not a Tablet, Even When It Shouldn't
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new desktop mode in Android 16, which will function differently depending on the device type. On Pixel phones and foldables like the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, the desktop mode, including windowed multitasking, will only be available when connected to an external display, while tablets can utilize the feature directly on their built-in screens. The new desktop mode is expected to be released with the Material 3 Expressive update in September.

articles.title: Save your hair this festival season with Typebea's new Dry Shampoo
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Typebea has launched its G5 3-in-1 Dry Shampoo, functioning as a dry shampoo, hair growth treatment, scalp exfoliator, and hair scent. The G5 Dry Shampoo has been described as an extension of TYPEBEA's Growth collection, and Metro readers can get 20% off on select hair products by using the code 'METRO20'.

articles.title: I hate ironing and now I don't ever do it thanks to this 'powerful' £35 gadget
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Pure Pop Slim Handheld Clothes Steamer is being sold for £34.99 instead of £49.99. The steamer is described as portable and heats up in around 15 seconds, pumping out 20g of steam a minute with a 70ml water tank, and is rated 4.2 out of 5 on Amazon.

articles.title: Inhabit® Announces Residential Product Release Slate at NAA Apartmentalize
articles.author: Inhabit
articles.summary: An industry leader has launched 15 new products and services. These releases include advancements in Voice AI, Data Analysis tools, NSPIRE Tools, and Affordable Housing Process Simplification.

articles.title: You might own a humanoid robot butler in 5 years, but will it be useful? Expert makes bizarre prediction
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Exotec's founder, Romain Moulin, predicts that humanoid robot butlers will be commercially available within five years, targeting the ultra-rich. These robots, exemplified by Elon Musk's 'Optimus' bot, will be capable of tasks like sweeping floors, but may only function for ten minutes before needing to recharge.

articles.title: ‘Raf' student platform enables creation of smart e-stores
org: University of Technology and Applied Sciences
articles.summary: Raf, a student-led start-up, is developing an AI-powered e-commerce platform for the Omani market. The platform offers features like automated store setup and smart data analytics, with plans to launch the full platform by early 2026 and introduce advanced AI features like sales analytics and product recommendations.

articles.title: Snoika Launches Enterprise-Grade AI SEO & Visibility Software at Viva Technology
articles.author: Snoika
articles.summary: Snoika has launched its enterprise-grade AI Search Engine Visibility and Optimization SaaS, designed to help organizations measure and influence their presence in AI-generated answers. The SaaS combines real-time visibility diagnostics with actionable AI SEO optimization, including prompt simulations, competitive benchmarking, and tailored AI SEO recommendations. It aims to improve a brand's share-of-voice across major AI engines.

articles.title: Chromafora Receives Frost & Sullivan's 2025 Global New Product Innovation Award for Excellence in PFAS Water Treatment Solutions
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Chromafora has launched SELPAXT™, an innovative solution for PFAS remediation that integrates Surfactant-ligand Assisted Membrane Filtration (SAMF) chemistry, ultrafiltration membranes, automatic regeneration, and remote monitoring. SELPAXT™ tackles both short- and long-chain PFAS compounds with high efficiency and robustness, setting a new standard for industrial water treatment. The product minimizes waste and offers remote monitoring capabilities.

articles.title: 'Dystopian future': Calls for drone delivery regulations over noise and privacy concerns
articles.author: Jane Moore
articles.summary: Deliveroo announced it will be initiating air deliveries using drones provided by Manna. The new service will begin with a trial phase and will be available to people within a 3km radius of Blanchardstown, Dublin 15.

articles.title: Truckstop Introduces New Load Board Features to Help Carriers Operate More Efficiently and Profitably
articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: Truckstop announced seven new features.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 confirmed to launch with AI-powered triple camera setup
articles.summary: Samsung has revealed details about the camera capabilities of the upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 7, emphasizing its AI-powered features for enhanced visual intelligence. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 features three rear cameras and is confirmed to be Samsung's thinnest and most durable foldable phone to date. The launch is expected in July alongside other models.

articles.title: Talenti gelato fans are begging the brand to make the jars easier to open — here's what the brand is doing about it
articles.author: Brooke Steinberg
articles.summary: Talenti is rolling out a new lid for their gelato jars as a short-term solution to address customer complaints about the difficulty of opening them. The company also has a team working on a long-term solution that preserves the signature look of their transparent jars while improving ease of use.

articles.title: Nestlé launches in-house AI service to ‘create high-quality product content at scale'
articles.author: George Nott
articles.summary: Nestlé has launched an AI-powered in-house service to create product content for online sales channels and social media marketing. This service utilizes digital twins of products, generated with AI and hosted on Microsoft cloud systems, to accelerate content creation and reduce costs. The service is being used by Nestlé's Integrated Marketing Services (IMS) function for scaling and localizing content across various brands like Purina, Nescafé Dolce Gusto and Nespresso.

articles.title: Amazon is about to be flooded with AI-generated video ads
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Amazon is simplifying the creation of generative AI ads for its sellers on its platform. The tool provides Amazon sellers with six AI-generated clips for ad creation. This enhancement aims to enable quick ad generation, sometimes with just a single click through Amazon Ads.

articles.title: Lucidworks Launches AI App Studio to Transform Digital Customer Experiences With No-Code AI Agent Development
articles.author: Lucidworks
articles.summary: Lucidworks has launched AI App Studio, a new capability within its SaaS platform, which enables businesses to create AI-powered customer experiences without code. AI App Studio includes features like Interactive Q&A, Q&A Chatbox, Generative Answers, and Product Review Summary to enhance customer interaction and is designed to provide immediate competitive advantages through a visual designer, ready-made templates, live testing, and performance analytics.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Series Launch Date Revealed: Price, And Expected Specs
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: OnePlus is expected to launch the Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 series in early July, potentially unveiling them on July 8. The Nord 5 series may feature a flat design, a 1.5K AMOLED 120Hz display, MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset, and a 6,550mAh battery with 80W charging, while the Nord CE 5 may include a Dimensity 8000 chipset and a 7,100mAh battery with 80W charging. The Nord 5 is expected to be priced around Rs 35,000 and the Nord CE 5 around Rs 25,000.

articles.title: Primark's 'stunning' £28 maxi dress 'looks gorgeous' on
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark introduced the Puff Sleeve Maxi Dress, priced at £28, available in white or green and sizes six through 20. The dress features a V-neckline, short puff sleeves, an empire waistline, and a tie closure. Shoppers can order it online for Click and Collect or purchase it in stores.

articles.title: 'Unreal' £28 Primark dress is 'gorgeous' and gives 'gentle shape'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark has introduced the Puff Sleeve Maxi Dress, retailing at £28, available in white or green, and sizes 6-20. The dress features a flowing maxi cut, tie back, and empire waistline and is available online through Click and Collect and in Primark stores.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Launched In India With 50MP Selfie Camera, Dimensity 7400, And 5500mAh Battery: Price, Features And More
articles.author: Lavanya R
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 60 smartphone in India, featuring a Dimensity 7400 processor, 50MP selfie camera, and a 5500mAh battery with 68W fast charging. Priced at ₹25,999, the phone will be available for purchase starting June 17 via Flipkart, Motorola's official website, and retail stores.

articles.title: Gardening fans run to Aldi for ‘beautiful' water feature that's £12 cheaper than The Range and lights up your space
articles.author: Digital Fabulous Editor
articles.summary: ALDI has launched a budget-friendly solar bird bath, available in three patterns for £17.99. Additionally, ALDI has introduced the Zero In Bug Zapper Lantern for £7.99, designed to eliminate insects in outdoor settings.

articles.title: M&S' 'pretty' £40 linen dress is 'lovely' and 'versatile' for summer holidays
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: M&S is promoting its Linen Rich V-Neck Mini Shift Dress, priced at £39.50, available in red and white, and designed for summer. Customer reviews highlight the dress's comfort and style, while also noting concerns about length and fabric. Other similar options are the £29.50 Linen Rich Striped Mini Shift Dress, the £32.50 Linen Rich V-Neck Mini Shift Dress, and the £29.50 Linen Rich Round Neck Mini Shift Dress.

articles.title: 30 Low-Cost, High-Reward Beauty Product Upgrades
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Tonymoly introduced an octopus-shaped blackhead remover. L'Oréal launched a hydrating foundation that doubles as a serum and an 8-second repairing hair treatment. Skin Food offers a peeling gel, while OGX provides an air-dry leave-in cream. Maybelline introduced a Lip Lifter Hydrating gloss and a Dark Circles Treatment Concealer, alongside a long-lasting liquid lipstick. E.l.f. offers a Poreless Putty Primer. Revlon launched a volcanic stone face roller. TGIN provides a miracle hair mask, and Catrice offers an "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener.

articles.title: Unleash Summer Freshness: Discover Olay & Secret's New Collection
articles.summary: Olay introduced the Summer Fizz Body Wash, and Secret launched the Clinical Fizz Deodorant Collection. These products feature three limited-edition fruity scents and are designed to nourish the skin and deliver freshness.

articles.title: Next shoppers snap up 'fabulous and flattering' €43.50 summer dress with pockets
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Next is offering a new summer linen dress priced at €43.50. The dress is available in sizes 6-26 and comes in various colors and prints, featuring a shift silhouette, side pockets, and a scooped back. Customer reviews indicate satisfaction with the dress's style and versatility.

articles.title: Gannett launches generative AI tool to answer readers' biggest questions
articles.author: Charisse Jones
articles.summary: Gannett, in partnership with Taboola, has launched DeeperDive, a generative AI engine on USA TODAY's website. This tool is designed to provide readers with immediate, tailored answers to questions, drawing on the expertise of USA TODAY journalists and Taboola's user data. DeeperDive aims to increase user engagement and create new monetization opportunities through content-related ads.

articles.title: M&S launches £39 beachy knit dress shoppers say you can dress up or down
articles.author: Anna Starnes Editor
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) has launched the Cotton Blend Knitted Round Neck Midi Dress, priced at £39.50, featuring a bohemian look and airy feel. Additionally, M&S introduced the Halter Neck Mini Beach Dress, priced at £59, with a crochet-inspired pattern and halter neck design, both aimed for the summer season.

articles.title: Chipotle adds a really popular item to its menus nationwide
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Chipotle has launched Adobo Ranch, a new smoky and spicy dipping sauce, available at locations across the U.S. and Canada starting June 17. Chipotle Rewards members can try it for free on launch day. The company emphasizes that the new ranch is made with real ingredients and no artificial additives.

articles.title: Chipotle adds a really popular item to its menus nationwide
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Taco Bell modifies its core menu items to create new offerings. These modifications include new cheeses or sauces, used to freshen the menu. This innovative approach ensures that customers have new and unexpected options.

articles.title: Alleged render of Nothing Phone 3 leaked online, hints a new camera design
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Nothing is preparing to launch Nothing Phone 3. Leaks suggest design changes, including the potential removal of the Glyph Interface and a new camera module. The phone is expected to run on a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8-series chip, feature Nothing OS 3.0 based on Android 15, and could be priced around GBP 800.

articles.title: NMG Receives Over US$1 Billion in Letters of Interest for its Project Debt Financing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nouveau Monde Graphite Inc. (NMG) is commissioning phase-1 facilities for value-added graphite products and silicon coating. The company is expanding its commercial team and forming partnerships to deliver advanced material solutions to the EV and energy storage sectors. These initiatives contribute to the company's goal of being a vertically integrated green energy material producer.

articles.title: ⚡Nevold Is Chanel's Recycling Division
articles.summary: Chanel launched NEVOLD, a new initiative designed to revolutionize textile waste management. NEVOLD aims to transform textile waste into new raw materials within the sustainable fashion industry.

articles.title: My beauty secrets to looking this good at 41...and why using this £18 skincare product from a young age is better than Botox
articles.author: MEG BYROM
articles.summary: Samantha Brett founded Naked Sundays in 2021 after identifying a need for easy-to-apply SPF products that don't ruin makeup. Naked Sundays launched a range of products including makeup packed with sun protection and an SPF spray.

articles.title: I Swear By This Product For My Bathroom And Hallways — And It's Not Just For Kids
articles.author: Haley Zovickian
articles.summary: GE rotational LED nightlights are useful gadgets that softly illuminate rooms at dusk. There are nightlights available on Amazon and Walmart as well, offering features like dimming, motion sensing, and color options. They are suitable for bathrooms, nurseries, hallways, and kitchens.

articles.title: Dallas gets first taste of Thermomix's $1,649 cooking robot
articles.author: Chloe Beaver
articles.summary: Thermomix USA launched a Thermomix Experience Center in Dallas to provide in-store demos of the Thermomix TM6 and Cookidoo subscription service. The Experience Center features a retail showroom, kitchen classroom, and media kitchen for influencers, offering a new way for consumers to engage with the product before purchase.

articles.title: Amazon launches discount store 'to rival Temu' that shoppers can't wait to try
articles.author: Alan Johnson
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new discount shopping service called 'Amazon Haul' in the UK, offering a wide variety of goods for £20 or less. This smartphone-only service, accessible via the Amazon Shopping app, provides low-priced products across categories like fashion, home, and lifestyle, with delivery costing £2.99 for orders under £15 and free for orders above that amount.

articles.title: Amazon is about to be flooded with AI-generated video ads
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Amazon has made its Video Generator generally available in the US, offering sellers a free tool to create photorealistic video ads quickly. New features include motion improvements to showcase products in action, the ability to create ads with multiple scenes including humans and pets, a video summarization feature, and a one-click image-to-video option. These updates aim to make creating engaging video ads more accessible for sellers on the Amazon platform.

articles.title: Nvidia's Generative AI To Fuel Hyper-Scalable 3D Rendering For L'Oréal
articles.author: Anusuya Lahiri
articles.summary: L'Oréal and Nvidia have partnered to use AI for scaling 3D digital rendering of L'Oréal products. This collaboration uses Nvidia AI Enterprise to expand creative possibilities for more creative and scalable campaigns to improve consumer engagement across social media, e-commerce and influencer marketing.

articles.title: Creatio Releases Second Edition of The No-Code Playbook: Age of AI with Integrated AI Guidance
articles.summary: Creatio has released the second edition of 'The No-Code Playbook: Age of AI,' a vendor-agnostic guide for enterprises to scale their no-code development capabilities in the era of AI. The updated playbook includes new AI practices, an AI value assessment framework (NOVA), and an integrated online toolkit, all designed to help no-code teams build cutting-edge AI solutions.

articles.title: M&S' £40 linen dress that's 'beautifully made' gets 'lots of compliments'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: M&S is promoting its Linen Rich V-Neck Mini Shift Dress, available in red and white, praised for its comfort and flattering style for summer. The dress has received positive reviews, though some customers noted issues with the length and fabric, M&S also offers similar styles, including the £29.50 Linen Rich Striped Mini Shift Dress, the £32.50 Linen Rich V-Neck Mini Shift Dress, and the £29.50 Linen Rich Round Neck Mini Shift Dress.

articles.title: Starbucks To Roll Out Microsoft Azure OpenAI Assistant For Baristas
articles.summary: Starbucks is piloting "Green Dot Assist," a generative AI assistant. This assistant aims to streamline barista tasks and enhance service speed. Starbucks plans a broader rollout in fiscal 2026.

articles.title: Boden dress so flattering and comfortable shoppers want it in all 6 patterns
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Boden offers a 15% discount on new styles, including the Sofia Trim Jersey Midi Dress, normally priced between £90 and £98, now available for £76.50-£83.30 with code JM7D. The dress comes in various colors and sizes with a fit-and-flare design.

articles.title: Snap to introduce new immersive and lightweight glasses in 2026
articles.author: Kuldeep Jha
articles.summary: Snap plans to launch Specs, a new augmented reality product, in 2026. Specs is a lightweight wearable computer integrated into glasses designed to enhance the physical environment through advanced AI. Developers are building new experiences for Spectacles, and Snap has announced significant updates to Snap OS, incorporating integrations with OpenAI and Google Cloud's Gemini to enable AI-powered Lenses.

articles.title: Council launches Jadu Agent-Ex: Search - AI powered Search Agent for voice controlled, accessible, multilingual web search
articles.author: Maggie Allin
articles.summary: Jadu launched Agent-Ex: Search, an AI-powered search technology designed for mobile-first, voice, multilingual, and accessible self-service. Agent-Ex: Search works with various web CMS platforms, providing real-time, content-based answers through text and speech without traditional search result pages or chatbots.

articles.title: Aldi drops 'divine' new lip balms similar to iconic £23 brand for under £4
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Aldi has launched Lacura Lip Butter Balms, a trio of lip balms priced at £3.49 each. These balms are available in Cake Pop, Dulce De Leche, and Vanilla flavors and are infused with Shea Butter & Murumuru Seed Butter. These are available in Aldi stores nationwide now.

articles.title: Microsoft's ROG Xbox Ally will feature a new 'Xbox full-screen experience' to finally rival the ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Microsoft will introduce a new "full-screen experience" for the ROG Xbox Ally later this year and other Windows 11 handhelds in 2026. This is in response to Valve's SteamOS.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Fold7: Thin, Light, & Durable
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Fold 7, touting it as their thinnest, lightest, and most advanced foldable phone. The company aims to address common concerns about foldable phones by focusing on a sleek design, enhanced durability with a new hinge design rated for 300,000+ folds, and advanced features like an improved camera.

articles.title: Android 16 is here, but not all phones are supported: Check the full list here
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Android is now available; however, not all phones are supported. Users are advised to check the full compatibility list to see if their device is eligible for the update.

articles.title: 万顺新材：电池铝箔可用于半固态电池、固态电池
articles.author: 每日经济新闻
articles.summary: 万顺新材's battery aluminum foil is applicable for semi-solid-state batteries and solid-state batteries.

articles.title: Last Minute Father's Day Gift Ideas on Amazon
articles.author: TMZ Staff
articles.summary: Ninja offers the Artisan Outdoor Pizza Oven, capable of cooking a 12-inch pizza in various styles in just three minutes. Hot Ones provides a Hot Sauce Challenge Set for those who enjoy spicy foods.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 does not have YouTube (for the moment) and this is the official reason
articles.author: Omar El-Sayed
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2, a next-gen console with improved graphics, load times, and overall performance. However, the console was launched without a native YouTube application. YouTube has confirmed that they are working with Nintendo to bring the YouTube app to the Switch 2 soon.

articles.title: Coca-Cola unveils 60cl bottle
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Coca-Cola Nigeria has launched a new 60cl bottle. This product aims to provide consumers with more refreshment, sharing opportunities, and joy.

articles.title: Beauty fans race to Primark as they drop £4 dupe of popular £26 dry shampoo – and it's completely aerosol free
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new aerosol-free dry shampoo priced at £4 for 54g. The dry shampoo contains hyaluronic acid and is designed to absorb oils, sweat, and volumize hair. It is presented as a budget-friendly alternative to Aveda's Shampowder dry shampoo, which costs £26 for 56g.

articles.title: Compatible Mobiles & Key Features
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Android 16 is officially available, introducing a redesigned user interface with 'Material Design 3 Expressive' and enhanced security features. The update includes live notifications, improved call clarity, native headphone controls, and advanced protection against online threats. Pixel device users with Tensor processors are the first to experience this upgrade.

articles.title: Google Pixel Archives
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Android 16 is rolling out with a new design. It includes key new features and security enhancements. The update also includes live notifications and an enhanced audio experience from Google.

articles.title: Mobile and devices Archives
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google launched Android 16 featuring a new design. Android 16 includes new key features. The updated version provides enhanced security features.

articles.title: Nando's serves up first Australian drive-thru restaurant and talks huge expansion over next five years
articles.author: Bryce Luff
articles.summary: Nando's has launched its first Australian drive-thru restaurant in Roxburgh Park, Melbourne, aiming to provide a unique customer experience. Hungry Jack's is also trialing a new digital voice-activated AI ordering system in some restaurants.

articles.title: China's DJI, the world's No. 1 drone manufacturer, will launch a robot vacuum cleaner this month.Acc..
articles.author: Song Kwang-Seop
articles.summary: DJI, the world's No. 1 drone manufacturer, is launching a robot vacuum cleaner named 'ROMO' this month. The product release is expected to coincide with the 618 Shopping Festival. ROMO may incorporate drone obstacle avoidance technology or LiDAR-based navigation.

articles.title: Android 16 is here, but not all phones are supported: Check the full list here
articles.summary: Google released Android 16, its latest operating system, initially supporting Pixel devices. Android 16 includes enhancements to accessibility, security, and productivity, along with a visual overhaul using Material 3 Expressive design language. New features include Live Updates, Advanced Protection, Adaptive Apps Across Devices, and a Battery Health Indicator for newer Pixel models.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Upgrade: Should You Buy It?
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Switch 2 on June 5th at $449.99. Key features include a magnetic Joy-Con connection, enhanced chat with an optional camera, 4K TV support, and 'Mario Kart World' as an initial exclusive title. The Switch 2 aims to provide tangible improvements over the original Switch.

articles.title: Coca-Cola unveils 60cl bottle
articles.author: Gbenga Aderanti
articles.summary: Coca-Cola Nigeria has launched a new 60cl bottle for its Coca-Cola, Fanta, and Sprite brands. The company aims to provide consumers with more refreshment and opportunities to share, offering additional value for the same price. This new bottle size is available nationwide.

articles.title: Google Launches Android 16 with New Features Like Live Updates and Battery Health Monitor
articles.author: Varun Keval
articles.summary: Google launched Android 16, its new operating system, on June 10, making it available to the public from June 11. Initially available for Google Pixel phones, Android 16 will soon be accessible on Samsung, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Motorola, and Nothing devices. The update introduces features like Live Updates, Material You Design enhancements, a Battery Health Monitor, and Pro Video Support.

articles.title: The return of Nokia 1100: Nostalgia, simplicity, market strategy in the digital age
articles.author: Burnett Munthali
articles.summary: HMD Global relaunched the Nokia 1100 mobile phone, targeting consumers seeking basic, reliable devices. The reintroduction of the Nokia 1100 is aimed at markets like the elderly, minimalists, and users in rural areas, while also tapping into the digital detox trend by providing an alternative to complex smartphones.

articles.title: Google starts Android 16 roll-out to Pixel phones
articles.summary: Google has begun rolling out Android 16 to Pixel smartphones. Android 16 includes priority notifications, increased protection from attacks, greater PC integration, and a Material 3 Expressive user interface redesign. The update is being released a quarter early to accelerate OS improvements and provide more frequent interim updates.

articles.title: Hangyo Ice Creams: Sweetening Cricket with RCB Partnership
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Hangyo Ice Creams, known for its innovative flavors, is launching new flavors in partnership with Royal Challengers Bangalore for the 2025 IPL season. This collaboration aims to enhance the cricketing experience through new ice cream flavors and extensive fan engagement.

articles.title: BluSky AI Inc. Announces Completion of Modular Design
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: BluSky AI Inc. has launched its SkyMod series, a modular AI datacenter infrastructure designed for indoor and outdoor deployment. The series includes SkyMod One, a one-megawatt unit, and SkyMod XL, a 1.7 MW capacity unit, both designed for rapid deployment. The SkyMod units are now available for deployment to BluSky AI's partner institutions, enterprise clients, and research facilities.

articles.title: Zee Entertainment unveils transformation into content and technology powerhouse
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd. ('Z') launched a new brand universe to reposition itself as a Content and Technology Powerhouse. The new brand, unveiled at Zee Cine Awards 2025 and officially adopted on June 7, 2025, features a modern design and futuristic appeal, aiming to enhance consumer experiences and reflect the company's ambitions for future growth through innovation and digital integration. The company's new brand aims to deliver meaningful entertainment experiences globally.

articles.title: Your Pixel just got the biggest free Android update of the year from Google
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Google has launched Android 16 for supported Pixel devices, which lays the foundation for the new Material 3 Expressive design and includes features that enhance accessibility and ease of use. The update also brings visual changes to the notification shade and settings menu, along with new security options and Live updates for compatible notifications. Additionally, Google released the June Pixel Drop, a quarterly feature update for Pixel phones, offering features like Pixel VIPs and Expressive Captions, with some features like custom stickers in Gboard being exclusive to Pixel 9 and newer phones.

articles.title: Best Asus laptops under ₹40,000: Top thin and light laptops with long battery life
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Asus laptops provide powerful performance and innovative features across a wide range, offering solid build quality. This diverse lineup caters to various user needs, from budget-friendly options to gaming-focused models, positioning Asus as a reliable choice.

articles.title: Fnac Darty unveils Beyond everyday, its 2030 strategic plan, to accelerate the rollout of its pioneering model on the European market
articles.summary: Fnac Darty is launching its 2030 strategic plan, "Beyond everyday", focused on expanding its service model in Europe, and incorporating circularity into its core operations. The plan aims to broaden service offerings to third-party partners and set new standards for customer experience, making it a benchmark in the market.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics announced on the 11th that it will launch its new low-end smartphone "Galaxy A36..
articles.author: A Letter
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will launch its new low-end smartphone "Galaxy A365G" in Korea on the 12th, available in Awesome Lavender, Awesome White, and Awesome Black for 499,400 won. The Galaxy A365G features a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display, a triple camera system including a 50-megapixel wide-angle lens, and the "Awesome Intelligence" AI suite which includes AI Eraser and Circle to Search functionality.

articles.title: Samsung Teases Upcoming Galaxy Z Series Foldable Smartphone, Hints ‘Thinnest, Lightest and Most Advanced Foldable Yet'
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Samsung teased its upcoming Galaxy Z series on June 11, 2025, showcasing the potential Galaxy Z Fold 7. The new Galaxy Z devices are described as the thinnest, lightest, and most advanced foldable yet, with major design improvements and advanced features expected. Reports suggest the series could include Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, potentially launching in July 2025.

articles.title: Amazon's monsoon sale on washing machines is here: Up to 56% off on top picks from biggest brands
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: LG is offering the LG 7 Kg top loader, a fully-automatic machine with Smart Inverter Technology. Bosch is introducing the Bosch WAJ24209IN, designed for busy households with AI-powered cycles and a steam function. Samsung offers the Samsung 7 kg front loader with EcoBubble and Hygiene Steam technology, while Haier presents the Haier 8 kg front loader with AI-powered cycles and PuriSteam technology.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus Available Under Rs 11,000 On Flipkart: Check Deal Details, Offers And Key Specs
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 60 Stylus in April 2025, now available on Flipkart. The phone features a built-in stylus, rugged design, and is currently offered with discounts like bank and exchange offers, bringing the price down to as low as Rs 10,899.

articles.title: 38 Beauty Products To Make You Jealous Of Yourself
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing or updating their cosmetic products. Lottabody is offering Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Monday Haircare released Dry Shampoo. Catrice is introducing "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener now in four shades, and E.l.f. introduced Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara and Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm.

articles.title: ELLE Exclusive: Aveda's New Drop Turned My Third-Day Hair Into A Chic Statement
articles.author: Siya Bhambwani
articles.summary: Aveda launched Shampowder™ Dry Shampoo, a 99% naturally derived, vegan, and cruelty-free product designed to absorb oil, add volume, and refresh hair between washes. The Shampowder uses montmorillonite clay and tapioca starch, featuring a soft floral aroma and sustainable packaging, making it a feel-good and environmentally conscious option.

articles.title: Pratt & Whitney Offers New Hot Section Option To Boost GTF Durability
articles.author: Christine Boynton
articles.summary: Pratt & Whitney introduced its next-generation Geared Turbofan Advantage engine. Operators of the base model inquired about retrofitting capabilities for the new variant.

articles.title: With Apple's iOS 26, you might actually want to make phone calls again
articles.author: Michael Grothaus
articles.summary: Apple is introducing iOS 26, a new operating system for the iPhone. While featuring a new "Liquid Glass" design, iOS 26 includes significant upgrades to the iPhone's phone call functions, including a new feature in the Phone app to reduce the time users spend on hold.

articles.title: Cyprus Launches E-Kalathi App for Real-Time Price Comparisons
articles.summary: Cyprus is launching the e-Kalathi app, a new digital consumer service. This platform, including a mobile app and website, provides real-time price listings from supermarkets across Cyprus, allowing users to track costs and find the best deals on everyday products. Supermarkets with an annual turnover above €5 million are required to participate.

articles.title: Ascendion and Philtech Inc. Launch a GCC in Cebu to Redefine Digital Operations
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Ascendion and Philtech Inc. launched a next-generation Global Capability Center (GCC) in Cebu with GenAI capabilities. Ascendion's AI-first platform, including AVA+ for software delivery and METal for talent orchestration, will be utilized to enhance services for Albertsons Companies. This launch introduces new AI-powered software engineering, customer experience, and digital transformation capabilities in the Philippines.

articles.title: Father's Day waffle gift by Levi Stroopwaffles
articles.summary: Levi Stroopwaffles is offering Super Dad and Power Dad gift boxes for Father's Day. Customers can also create personalized boxes for their fathers.

articles.title: Google launches Android 16: Here's what you need to know
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google launched Android 16 with improved notifications, enhanced security, better camera features, and increased tablet productivity. The update introduces live updates for notifications, clearer calling with hearing devices, Advanced Protection for enhanced security, and desktop windowing for tablets. Android 16 also upgrades camera and media capabilities with enhanced control, the Advanced Professional Video (APV) codec, and improved photo picker integration.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: 3.5M+ Sales in 4 Days!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2, selling 3.5 million units in four days. The Switch 2 boasts an improved OLED screen and enhanced processing power, focusing on a seamless transition between docked and handheld modes. It appeals to a broad audience, including families and casual gamers, prioritizing unique gameplay and portability.

articles.title: How to fix the battery charge indicator on your Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2. However, a battery bug has impacted early adopters. Nintendo published a support article to address the bug.

articles.title: 36 Affordable Beauty Swaps For More Expensive Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Various companies are introducing new affordable beauty products. These include Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, Lottabody's Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, Hawaiian Tropic's SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush, Sally Hansen's Insta-Dri nail polish, Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo, E.l.f. Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm, Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, Olay's Firming Body Lotion, Mise En Scene Perfect Serum, E.l.f.'s Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops, E.l.f's Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, Maybelline Superfluff Volumizing Brow Mousse, Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, Jergens Natural Glow Firming Self Tanner Body Lotion, Eos' Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion with recently released matching Vanilla Cashmere Shave Oil, MagicMinerals AirBrush Foundation, The Face Shop's Rice Water Bright Foaming Facial Cleanser, Differin Acne Treatment Gel, Catrice's Magic Shaper Face Cream Palette, Physicians Formula Butter Glow & Go Stick, NYX matte setting spray, Briotech spray, Essence's Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops, Moodmatcher color-changing lipstick, and L'Oréal Paris BB Cream as alternatives to costlier products.

articles.title: Celebrity-owned beauty brand sends shoppers wild over must-have item with surprising feature: 'OMG yes I've been waiting for this
articles.author: ANDREA ROBERTSON
articles.summary: TYPEBEA, a haircare brand founded by Rita Ora and Anna Lahey, launched its new product, the G·5 3-in-1 Dry Shampoo. This dry shampoo refreshes hair, adds volume, supports hair health with ingredients like Baicapil, and is available for $50 ($42.50 with subscription) on the TYPEBEA website.

articles.title: Editor's Picks: The 5 best Ninja Blenders of 2025
articles.author: Belad Al-Karkhey
articles.summary: Ninja is launching the Ninja Blast Wireless Mini Blender, an Amazon exclusive. This blender features stainless steel BlastBlade for cutting through ice and frozen fruits/vegetables, and includes a leak-proof drinking lid. The blender also boasts a long-lasting battery life and is dishwasher-friendly.

articles.title: 42 Thoughtful Last-Minute Father's Day Gifts That'll Get To Dad On Time
articles.author: Katherine Louie
articles.summary: The article features numerous companies and their products suitable as last-minute Father's Day gifts. Specifically, it highlights the comfort and performance of Brooks Glycerin 22 Running Shoes, noise-canceling capabilities of Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones, the flavorful Harry & David's Summer Grilling Gift Box, the innovative Birdsnap's Smart Bird Feeder, and the customizable coffee subscription from Atlas Coffee Club.

articles.title: Australian-led benchmarking study puts AI's creative chops under the spotlight
articles.author: Cat Mcginn
articles.summary: Springboards, an Australian AI startup, is launching a new global benchmarking study for large language models (LLMs). The study aims to help agencies and brands identify which AI tools are best for idea generation and creative variations. Participants can explore the CreativityBenchmark.ai platform to participate in the benchmarking process.

articles.title: Lynn welcomes Lakay
articles.author: Sophia Harris
articles.summary: Lakay Fresh Mini Market, the first Haitian market on Market Street in Lynn, MA, celebrated its grand opening. The market offers items such as Lwil Maskriti (Castor Oil), Farine de Manioc (Cassava flour), Harina de Pana (Breadfruit flour), Couronne fruit champagne, and ragaman, catering to the needs of the Haitian community.

articles.title: 39 Things That Reviewers Would Recommend
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Eos launched Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, a new iteration of the TikTok-famous Eos body lotion, featuring a whipped vanilla, musk, and soft caramel scent. This oil protects skin from razor mishaps, helping users avoid razor burn and achieve an extra close shave.

articles.title: Quirky 'cake towels' revitalize old family business
articles.author: Zhang Yi
articles.summary: Lin Ying-sui, a Taiwan entrepreneur, introduced ingeniously crafted cake-shaped towels. These nonedible "cakes" rescued his family's towel factory and propelled him to venture into new markets. Lin created towel cakes that mimic local delicacies, trees and flowers.

articles.title: Nokia drives cloud-native, AI-driven, secure networks for hyperconnected world
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: Nokia is featured in the provided content with image data, suggesting the potential launch or update of a new product or service.

articles.title: Google rolls out Android 16: Check what's new, eligible devices and how to update
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Google has initiated the rollout of Android 16, its newest mobile operating system. The update includes several improvements.

articles.title: Aldi drops 'divine' new lip balms similar to iconic �23 brand for under �4
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Aldi's recently released Lacura beauty product is being recognized as the highlight of their new summer collection.

articles.title: Lemony is a plug-and-play device for secure on-premise AI
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: Lemony launched a simple device designed to deliver on-premise artificial intelligence. This new product aims to redefine how organizations deploy generative AI.

articles.title: Android 16 is out now, but its big visual redesign might not arrive until September
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Android has released Android 16, featuring live updates and new security tools. This new version is now available.

articles.title: Lightweight Blankets From Amazon That Look Fresh Out Of An Interior Design Catalog
articles.author: Huffington Post
articles.summary: Companies are introducing breezy and affordable summer blankets, offering an alternative to traditional winter bedding.

articles.title: Musk's Starlink licence decision up to South African regulator
articles.author: Moneyweb
articles.summary: Starlink's technology may provide South African users with a new and more affordable internet service option.

articles.title: Dreame L10S Ultra robot vacuum cleaner review: Should you spend ₹45,000 on this?
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Dreame introduced the L10S Ultra robot vacuum. The L10S Ultra features self-emptying, mopping, and smart navigation capabilities.

articles.title: ByteDance AI model
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: ByteDance launched a new version.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 sales set a record in four days
articles.author: The Buffalo News
articles.summary: Nintendo launched a new console priced at $450. This is Nintendo's first major console launch since the original Switch arrived eight years ago.

articles.title: I replaced my Pixel 9 Pro for this $700 Android phone - and didn't regret it
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Redmagic 10 Air offers performance and build quality, positioning itself as a replacement for existing phones. However, the phone has a few caveats.
